data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 72,667 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hato Mayor, Dominican Republic

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Hato Mayor, Dominican Republic honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Hato Mayor, Dominican Republic.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Hato Mayor, Dominican Republic a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Hato Mayor unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, I pray that the Japanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Hato Mayor, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Hato Mayor. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Hato Mayor, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

location.name: Hato Mayor
location.cities_list: Hato Mayor del Rey, Sabana de la Mar, El Valle
location.cities_list_w_pop: Hato Mayor del Rey (35,999), Sabana de la Mar (13,977), El Valle (5,666)
